org.grouplens.lenskit.data.sql

Class JDBCRatingDAO

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.grouplens.lenskit.data.sql.JDBCRatingDAO
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EventDAO, ItemDAO, ItemEventDAO, UserDAO, UserEventDAO

    public class JDBCRatingDAO
extends Object
implements EventDAO, UserEventDAO, ItemEventDAO, UserDAO, ItemDAO

    Rating DAO backed by a JDBC connection. This DAO can only store rating data; no other events are supported.

    • Constructor Detail

      • JDBCRatingDAO

        @Deprecated
public JDBCRatingDAO(@WillCloseWhenClosed
                                  Connection dbc,
                                  SQLStatementFactory sfac)
        Deprecated. Use newBuilder().

        Create a new JDBC rating DAO. The resulting DAO will be uncached.

        Parameters:
        dbc - The database connection. The connection will be closed when the DAO is closed.
        sfac - The statement factory.

      • JDBCRatingDAO

        @Deprecated
public JDBCRatingDAO(Connection dbc,
                                  SQLStatementFactory sfac,
                                  boolean close)
        Deprecated. Use newBuilder().

        Create a new JDBC rating DAO. The resulting DAO will be uncached.

        Parameters:
        dbc - The database connection.
        sfac - The statement factory.
        close - Whether to close the database connection when the DAO is closed.

      • streamEventsByUser

        public ObjectStream<UserHistory<Event>> streamEventsByUser()
        Description copied from interface: UserEventDAO

        Stream events grouped by user.

        Specified by:
        streamEventsByUser in interface UserEventDAO
        Returns:
        A stream of user histories. If a user exists, but does not have any history, they may or may not be included depending on the DAO implementation.

      • streamEventsByUser

        public <E extends Event> ObjectStream<UserHistory<E>> streamEventsByUser(Class<E> type)
        Description copied from interface: UserEventDAO

        Stream events grouped by user.

        Specified by:
        streamEventsByUser in interface UserEventDAO
        Parameters:
        type - The type of item to look for.
        Returns:
        A stream of user histories, filtered to contain events of type type. If a user exists, but does not have any history, they may or may not be included depending on the DAO implementation.

      • streamEventsByItem

        public ObjectStream<ItemEventCollection<Event>> streamEventsByItem()
        Description copied from interface: ItemEventDAO

        Stream events grouped by item.

        Specified by:
        streamEventsByItem in interface ItemEventDAO
        Returns:
        A stream iterating over the events from all items. If an item exists but does not have any events, it may or may not be included depending on the DAO implementation.

      • streamEventsByItem

        public <E extends Event> ObjectStream<ItemEventCollection<E>> streamEventsByItem(Class<E> type)
        Description copied from interface: ItemEventDAO

        Stream events grouped by item.

        Specified by:
        streamEventsByItem in interface ItemEventDAO
        Parameters:
        type - The type of item to look for.
        Returns:
        A stream iterating over the events of type type from all items. If an item exists but does not have any events, it may or may not be included depending on the DAO implementation.
